## R Markdown

```{r}
# Parameters
S <- ... #susceptible population
I <- ... #infected population
A <- ... #adaptively immune population
b <- ... #birthrate (per uninfected)
d <- ... #deathrate (per uninfected)
v <- ... #virulence that bids up natural mortality rates
d_v <- d + v #death rate of covid 19 per person (per infected)
beta <- ... #transmission rate (per infected individual)
gamma <- ... #recovery rate (per infected)
i <- ... #adaptive immunity by vaccines / infection
alpha <- ... #rate of vaccination
#Model
ds <- b(S+A) - dS - alpha*S - beta*S*I
dA <- alpha*S + gamma*I - d*A - beta*A*I*(1-i)
dI <- beta*S*I + beta*A*I*(1-i) - gamma*I - (d_v)*I
```
